data.text: Mina ɠɔmazei ga nii a ɠɛ lina,
È-laaʋɛ mina è maamusɛ, nu ɠiligiti zɛ ná, ti kɛ.
Kɔtui wuiʋɛ, ɲaɠaegi wuɲɛgi wui,
Ziiɠaawanai ɲɔuʋɛ, ziiɠulagi ɠeɠaaɓa,
Fizɔgɛ è zelii lo nui ma kɛlɛi zu,
Nu wɔɔlai ná-zelilomai, ɠa ná-wooɠɛɠiladai lɛɛzu,
Ziɠo nui ɠa ɗa ɠɛlɛ kɔin gulɔi ʋa,
Siɛziɛ nui maa ɠa ɠoozana seizuʋɛ ʋa,
Gulɔi ta gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgi, ta ɗa nu yiiɠaanɛ,
Mina ɓeteʋe è-wɔɔlaiti ba, ta è-ɠɛɛ bɔɔlaiti.
Ziɛ ga ɠimalai dòun zunu, zìimaʋɛ laa ɠa ve ga koozunɛɛi,
Ɠima nui ɠa ɗa maanɔɠɔi ɠa é ʋaazu, é lɛkpɛ tuɠɔ,
Ni nui ta a ɓɔɠɔ ɠɛna ga zeelaga è ʋɔ bɛ, é ʋilɛ nui ta ná-kuye vaa ʋa, nii è la kwɛɛ,
Ni nui ta a tuya loona seiɲɔɠɔi ʋɛ, é wooɠula la sobuzobui,
Kpɔɛleʋe anzanui ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ziɛi, é ʋilɛsu peinpein,
Ɗa wɔinna ga è gaaɓɛ, kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ɗa ɠɛ fiilɛi zosu ga yeei,
Kɔlui ɠa ɗa kɔlui ɠaali,
Zɔi é wɛlɛzu kooleɠoole gului ma, toɠa ma waai ta mi,
Ʋelei nu ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazuʋɛ ɠaazu la ziɛi wu,
Gɔvɛalaazu ta undaaʋili zeɠezaɠai ti zulaa la vega,
Wali ɠaei ta zanugi, ti ɠaa ɠa ɗa wuun ga abui, ma nɔɠɔi ʋa ɠula ba,
Anɛɛ ni ɗa ɠimalala nui ziɠazu kodai zu ga etei, eɠɛʋelei nu a ɗa kpazii ziɠa la,
Ɗa-loganiiti gilagilagi ɠɛʋelei ɠwɛɛ ga pagɔ,
Mazɔlɔɔ kpɛtɛi la zeeyɛga ma eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Siɛgi zu è tufa vɔɔi leʋezu la, tufa wundui ɠa ɗa wuzeɠe,
ɗa-ʋaalagiti maaleɠaiti ta ɠɛ ga è maaɠili zɔɔlaiti,
boliiti ta-ɲiimiɗɛi maanɛɛʋɛ, é kula ɠɛ ga è-laamianigi,
